text:
While JMeter is running, it would be very helpful if the data received could be
sent on (relayed) to a browser for viewing the page. (This could be a feature 
that could be easily enabled and disabled). 

Mohan
creator: mv100@softhome.net

text: The Tree View Listener allows this; and Save Results to a fil can also be used
creator: sebb@apache.org
